languages.text: {n}Каллигос довольно поглаживает оружие.{/n} "Тем, для чего был рожден — воевать и сметать с пути. У меня есть список тех, чьи головы будут славно смотреться на моем капитанском мостике".

{n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос довольно поглаживает оружие.{/n} "Тем, для чего был рожден — воевать и сметать с пути. У меня есть список тех, чьи головы будут славно смотреться на моем капитанском мостике".

traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos acaricia el arma con expresión complacida.{/n} «Lo que nací para hacer. Librar una guerra y exterminar a todo el que se interponga en mi camino. Tengo una larga lista de personas cuyas cabezas adornarán estupendamente el puente de mi nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos acaricia el arma con expresión complacida.{/n} «Lo que nací para hacer. Librar una guerra y exterminar a todo el que se interponga en mi camino. Tengo una larga lista de personas cuyas cabezas adornarán estupendamente el puente de mi nave».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯轻抚着武器，看起来很满意。{/n}“干我生来就该干的事。我要挑起战争，扫清所有敢阻挡我的人。我已经列了一份不错的名单，上面有很多人，我打算把他们的头挂在我的舰桥上。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯轻抚着武器，看起来很满意。{/n}“干我生来就该干的事。我要挑起战争，扫清所有敢阻挡我的人。我已经列了一份不错的名单，上面有很多人，我打算把他们的头挂在我的舰桥上。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos caresse son arme, l'air satisfait.{/n} « Ce pour quoi je suis né : guerroyer et écraser tous ceux qui se mettent en travers de mon chemin. J'ai une longue liste de ceux dont la tête décorerait à merveille la passerelle de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos caresse son arme, l'air satisfait.{/n} « Ce pour quoi je suis né : guerroyer et écraser tous ceux qui se mettent en travers de mon chemin. J'ai une longue liste de ceux dont la tête décorerait à merveille la passerelle de mon vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは嬉しそうに武器を撫でる。{/n}「俺はこのために生まれてきた。戦争をして、邪魔者を一掃する。俺の船のブリッジの飾りになるような首の持ち主のリストを用意した」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは嬉しそうに武器を撫でる。{/n}「俺はこのために生まれてきた。戦争をして、邪魔者を一掃する。俺の船のブリッジの飾りになるような首の持ち主のリストを用意した」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos streicht mit zufriedener Miene sanft über die Waffe.{/n} "Wofür ich geboren wurde. Krieg führen und jeden beiseitefegen, der mir im Weg steht. Ich habe eine umfangreiche Liste derer, dessen Köpfe sich prächtig auf der Brücke meines Schiffs machen würden."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos streicht mit zufriedener Miene sanft über die Waffe.{/n} "Wofür ich geboren wurde. Krieg führen und jeden beiseitefegen, der mir im Weg steht. Ich habe eine umfangreiche Liste derer, dessen Köpfe sich prächtig auf der Brücke meines Schiffs machen würden."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Memnun kalmış görünen Calligos, silahı okşuyor.{/n} "Uğruna doğduğum şeyi. Yani savaşacak ve yoluma çıkanları yok edeceğim. Gemimin köprüsüne çok yakışacak birkaç kellelik bir listem var."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos strokes the weapon, looking pleased.{/n} "What I was born to do. Make war and sweep away any who stand in my path. I have a healthy list of those whose heads will make great decorations for my ship's bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos, memnun bir şekilde gözükerek silahı okşuyor.{/n} "Uğruna doğduğum şeyi. Yani savaşmak ve yoluma çıkanları yok etmek. Gemimin köprüsüne çok yakışacak birkaç kelleden oluşan bir listem var."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
